coursesProgress.title: Courses & Progress
coursesProgress.subtitle: This section is working on progress, all the data and texts here is placeholders
coursesProgress.description: I believe in continuous learning and staying updated with the latest technologies. Here's my structured learning roadmap:

roadmapItems.title: Advanced Machine Learning
roadmapItems.description: Diving deeper into neural networks, deep learning algorithms, and their practical applications in robotics and computer vision.

roadmapItems.title: Advanced C++ Programming
roadmapItems.description: Strengthening my C++ skills for real-time embedded systems and performance-critical robotics applications.

roadmapItems.title: PCB Design & Electronics
roadmapItems.description: Learning professional PCB design to create custom electronic solutions for my IoT and robotics projects.

roadmapItems.title: Cloud Infrastructure
roadmapItems.description: Learning to design and deploy scalable cloud solutions for IoT applications and data processing systems.

roadmapItems.title: ROS 2 (Robot Operating System)
roadmapItems.description: Mastering ROS 2 for building more sophisticated robotic systems with better communication and modularity.

roadmapItems.title: Arabic Programming Content Creation
roadmapItems.description: Creating educational content in Arabic to help bridge the language gap in technical education in the Middle East.

learningGoals: Become proficient in end-to-end AI/ML pipeline development
Master cloud-native development for IoT applications
Build educational content for Arabic-speaking engineers
